title: Ukraine: Zelensky says nearly a third of power stations destroyed
description: Ukraine's Civil Defence Service says over a thousand towns and villages without power. Also: teachers and transport workers across France join strike action that's already affected fuel supplies, and the saga of an ancient Japanese toilet accidentally destroyed in a freak accident!
itunes:subtitle: Ukraine's Civil Defence Service says over a thousand towns and villages without power
itunes:summary: Ukraine's Civil Defence Service says over a thousand towns and villages without power. Also: teachers and transport workers across France join strike action that's already affected fuel supplies, and the saga of an ancient Japanese toilet accidentally destroyed in a freak accident!
itunes:author: BBC World Service
